title: Why couldn't we remake?
body: Ezreal disconnected right before jungle camps spawned yet we never received the option to remake.

replies.body: I edited out the match link to prevent placing unwanted spotlight on another player.  It doesn't look like requirements were met to /remake the match and pass a vote.  It does look like your teammate was able to participate, though, even if the match didn't last long.  The [remake ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ)guide also has more information on how the system will trigger a vote.  Good luck in your next games!
